<!--
Before submitting a PR, please read https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/blob/dev/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request-guidelines

1. Give the PR a descriptive title.

  Examples of good title:
    - fix(windows): Fix race condition in event loop
    - docs: Update docstrings
    - feat: add `Window::set_fullscreen`

  Examples of bad title:
    - fix #7123
    - update docs
    - fix bugs

2. If there is a related issue, referenced in the PR text, e.g. closes #123.
3. Ensure `cargo test` passes.
4. Open as a draft PR if your work is still in progress.
5. Ensure that all your commits are signed https://docs.github.com/en/authentication/managing-commit-signature-verification/signing-commits
-->
